ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: layout of tabs on Pages is not adaptable to mobile screens
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior **Problem** on mobile screens, tabs are positioned horizontally, but because of huge size, they look like bubbles and morover, its container is not scrollable horizontally. ### Steps to reproduce 1. Go to 'Pages' 2. Open DevTools & select any of mobile dimensions 3. Observe the view of pages tabs **Expected result:** position horizontally with wrapping items in a row ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Self-hosted
